archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Metric Management
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manage the specification lifecycle and the operations of Metrics.

properties.value: Metric Management defines and maintains the specification of Metrics: high-level description, detailed specification (formulas, thresholds, rules, consequences), applicability, status. Metric Management also manages Metric measurement operations: execution of on-demand and recurring collection jobs, rule evaluation, and consequences (actions and notifications).
